channel.title: Visual basics program
channel.description:
Hello i was wondering if anyone could help me code something for a friend.
I need to make a drop down box with some options in it. you choose one and move onto the next. then when you have done them all click a button that says check. if the drop down box has the correct thing in it a tick will appear beside the box.
How could i make this ?

item.title: Visual basics program
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Well, for one: You could start off with learning the language.

Read full topic
